com.beaglebuddy.mp3.id3v23.frame_body
Class ID3v23FrameBodyUtility

java.lang.Object
  com.beaglebuddy.mp3.id3v23.frame_body.ID3v23FrameBodyUtility
Direct Known Subclasses:
ID3v23FrameBody
public class ID3v23FrameBodyUtility
extends java.lang.Object
Base class for the body of ID3V2.3 frames. This class is simply a collection of utility methods and is not a frame body type.

See Also:
ID3 tag version 2.3.0 standard, wikipedia history of ID3 tags

formateDate

public static java.lang.String formateDate(java.util.Date date)
formats a date as YYYYMMDD.

Parameters:
date - the date to format. If null, then the today's date is used.
Returns:
the specified date formatted as YYYYMMDD.

getNextNullTerminator

public int getNextNullTerminator(byte[] buffer,
                                 int startingFrom,
                                 java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
finds the next null terminating character according to the character encoding in the raw data stream.

Parameters:
buffer - the raw binary bytes in which to find the next null terminator character.
startingFrom - the index at which to start searching from in the data.
charset - the character set used to encode the string (and hence determine the null terminating character).

Returns:
the index of the next null terminator in the data.

hex

public static java.lang.String hex(byte data)
formats a single byte as a 2 digit hex value, ie, 0xbb, where 0 < b < F.

Parameters:
data - byte data whose value will be converted to hex.

Returns:
the hex representation of a byte.

hex

public static java.lang.String hex(byte[] data,
                                   int indent)
formats raw binary byte data as a sequence of bytes in the format 0xbb 0xbb ... with 16 bytes per line.

Parameters:
data - raw binary data to be printed.
indent - number of spaces to indent each line of output.

Returns:
a string representation of the binary data as hexadecimal bytes.

pad

public static java.lang.String pad(int numSpaces)
Parameters:
numSpaces - number of spaces to pad.
Returns:
a string of spaces.

pricesToString

public static java.lang.String pricesToString(java.util.List<Price> prices)
convert the list of prices to a string, with each price separated by the "/" character.

Parameters:
prices - list of prices.
Returns:
a string representation of the list of price(s).

converts an integer value to a 4 byte array.

Parameters:

Returns:

shortToBytes

public static byte[] shortToBytes(int n)
converts a short value to a 2 byte array.

Parameters:

Returns:
a 2 byte array holding the short value.

stringToBytes

public static byte[] stringToBytes(java.nio.charset.Charset encoding,
                                   java.lang.String string)
converts a String to a byte array using a specified character set encoding. The String class has a getBytes() method, but this method does not include a null terminator in the byte array that it returns. This method here does.

Parameters:
encoding - the encoding to use when converting the string to a byte array.
string - the string to be converted to a byte array.
Returns:
a byte array holding the string value in the specified encoding.
